metadata.title: CVE-2020-9849 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved statemanagement. This issue is fixed in macOS Big Sur 11.0.1, watchOS 7.0, iOS14.0 and iPadOS 14.0, iTunes for Windows 12.10.9, iCloud for Windows 11.5,tvOS 14.0. A remote attacker may be able to leak memory.

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
